right.item:
MMA/PA gel

A methionine, threonine, and valine free and isoleucine low protein substitute for use in the dietary management of Methylmalonic Acidaemia (MMA) and Propionic Acidaemia (PA) for children from 12 months to 10 years of age.

MMA/PA express

A methionine, threonine, and valine free and isoleucine low protein substitute for use in the dietary management of Methylmalonic Acidaemia (MMA) and Propionic Acidaemia (PA) in individuals aged 8 years and older.
